column2: Today is a dark day in history for Mankind, for today the Cannibalistic Horse Sleipnir has conquered his way to owning his own land. This deadly horse has eaten over 10,000 humans, and over 5,000 Horses in his lifetime. Even now as this message travels across the land, more Horses and people flock to Sleipnir's banner to spread the word of Sleipnir to the rest of the world. We truly may be doomed.
